activities: We convert audio files to text for companies and other organizations.  While we rarely collect the audio files directly from consumers, we have put in place policies to protect the information contained in any audio files transferred to us by our customers and other third party service providers. Some of these audio files, typically recordings of phone calls with their customers, originate in the EU and can contain personal information about the caller.
eucountries: Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Our certification covers personally identifiable information of end customers that is contained in the audio files transferred to us and the resulting text files that are returned to our customers.  All of the data is processed electronically (ie we have no manually processed data).
recoursemech: We are committed to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
